ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.25 ounce) cups Snack Pack® Vanilla Pudding
1 ½ cups Reddi-wip® Fat Free Dairy Whipped Topping
1 (9 inch) prepared angel food cake, cut into 1-inch pieces
4 cups assorted fresh berries (such as blueberries, raspberries and blackberries)

cookingTips: Layer ingredients in clear jars for visual appeal and easy assembly
Cube the angel food cake into uniform pieces to layer evenly
Assemble just before serving to prevent cake from becoming soggy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in making convenient, portable trifles using prepared components for maximum ease and minimal prep.
